Run PCA - BiocSingular

Source: R/dimension_reduction.R
dot-run_pca_biocsingular.Rd

Performs PCA based on the biocSingular package

.run_pca_biocsingular(
  x,
  ncp = 100,
  center = TRUE,
  scale = TRUE,
  rev = FALSE,
  set_seed = TRUE,
  seed_number = 1234,
  BSPARAM = c("irlba", "exact", "random"),
  BPPARAM = BiocParallel::SerialParam(),
  ...
)

Arguments

x

matrix or object that can be converted to matrix

ncp

number of principal components to calculate

center

center the matrix before pca

scale

scale features

rev

reverse PCA

set_seed

use of seed

seed_number

seed number to use

BSPARAM

method to use

BPPARAM

BiocParallelParam object

Value

list of eigenvalues, loadings and pca coordinates

Contents

Developed by Ruben Dries, Jiaji George Chen, Joselyn C. Chávez-Fuentes, Guo-Cheng Yuan, Matthew O’Brien, Edward Ruiz, Wen Wang, Natalie Del Rossi.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
